attributes.action: Give some benefits to single, working people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single working people are often worse of than people claiming benefits, this is not right. We deserve more, i propose that the council tax reduction is raised from 25% to 50% and also that income tax is lowered by 5%. This would be fair for both the government to still make money from us, but also benefits the single person.
